meanings.definition: A person who establishes or initiates something.
meanings.sent1: The instituter of the club organized the first meeting.
meanings.sent2: The instituter of the company had a vision for its growth.
meanings.sent3: The instituter of the bake sale forgot to bring the cookies!
meanings.sent4: She was the instituter of change in our community.
meanings.sent5: The instituter of the charity event inspired many to join.

meanings.definition: To set up or create something.
meanings.sent1: They will instituter new rules for the game.
meanings.sent2: She decided to instituter a weekly family movie night.
meanings.sent3: He tried to instituter a no-homework policy, but it didn't work.
meanings.sent4: The artist instituter a beautiful painting with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The team will instituter a training program for new employees.
